ovdesc.p: A monthly activity record to be created to store activities of the month per collector, this record will be used for reporting and to calculate incentive points.

calculation of incentive points is done only after five collections have been done This record is updated automatically online for each action performed by the collector and during end of day batch for actions generated by system.

desc.p: Action codes performed by collector during the month that appears in the ID of the record.
Number of actions (action in previous field) performed during the month.
Outcomes codes related to action in the ‘ACTION’ field.
Number of outcomes for the outcome in the previous field.
Total outcome due amount for the outcome in “OUTCOME CODE” field.
This field will hold the total of incentive points allocated to the collector during the month.
